definitions.title: n.pr.loc.
definitions.body: in Judah (perh. = temple of ‘ Anât Bae:Rel 53 Hal:JAs. 7, xiii. 1879, p. 208, cf. foll.) Jos 15:59; —mod. Beit ‘Anûn Rob:BR iii. 280 f. Guêrin:Judêe iii. 151 f. Survey:iii. 351. But LXXL Bhqarwq, cf. mod. Bittîr, c. 2 1/2 hours SW. fr. Jerus. Bd:Pal 171.
